Name: Delicious Minty Fruit Tea
Desc: A cooling and refreshing drink. The sweet flavor of the tea combines with light, clear floral notes on one hand, and tangles with a dash of fruity on the other, filling your mouth and throat with their aroma. Wait a moment â€” why are there only ice cubes left in the cup?
Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
